text:
JMX 1.2 adds constraints on MBean parameters 
(http://java.sun.com/j2ee/1.4/docs/api/javax/management/MBeanParameterInfo.html#MBeanParameterInfo(java.lang.String,%20java.lang.String,%20java.lang.String)

Throws:
    IllegalArgumentException - if name is not a valid Java identifier or if type
is not a syntactically legal Java type name. Java reserved words are not
considered illegal here.

LoggerDynamicMBean fails on Jonas that uses JMX 1.2, as "class name" or
"appender name" are not valid Java identifiers (line 102)
creator: ndeloof@capgemini.fr
